definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Argentina's trade balance with China swung into a deficit in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷对华贸易差额在2008年转为逆差。

sentences.english: The US still consumes more than it produces, running a chronic trade deficit.
sentences.chinese: 美国仍然是消费多于生产，留下了长期性的贸易逆差。

sentences.english: In that same year, the United States ran a trade deficit of $709 billion.
sentences.chinese: 同年，美国的贸易逆差达到7090亿美元。

sentences.english: Trade surpluses and deficits derive from mispriced currencies arising from government manipulation.
sentences.chinese: 贸易顺差和逆差源于政府操纵引起的货币价格扭曲。

sentences.english: S. as much as $60 billion each year in trade deficits to Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 川普称，每年美对墨贸易逆差高达600亿美元。

sentences.english: The US needs to cut its trade deficit, China its surplus.
sentences.chinese: 美国需要削减他的贸易逆差，中国则对外贸易过剩。

sentences.english: China has a surplus in trade of goods, but runs a deficit in trade of services.
sentences.chinese: 中国的货物贸易是顺差，但服务贸易是逆差。

sentences.english: This is the largest such deficit since comparable records began in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 这是自1998年以来可比数据中逆差最大的一次。

sentences.english: They could not afford to ignore Perot's message on the deficit.
sentences.chinese: 他们不能漠视佩罗特的信息在贸易逆差。

sentences.english: It is fueling huge trade deficits in the United States and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 它让美国和欧洲陷入巨大的贸易逆差困境中。

sentences.english: It goes up, it goes down.
sentences.chinese: 贸易逆差有升有降，这很正常。

sentences.english: Figures due on March 9th may even show a deficit in January.
sentences.chinese: 三月九号数据显示一月份贸易逆差继续扩大。

sentences.english: The trade deficit is coming down, you know I think it's good.
sentences.chinese: 至少贸易逆差下降了，这是好事儿。

sentences.english: Republicans and Democrats meant to outdo themselves in cutting the deficit.
sentences.chinese: 共和党和民主党想超越自己在切削贸易逆差。

sentences.english: The EU reported a 12.2-billion-euro trade deficit with China in July.
sentences.chinese: 7月欧盟对中国的贸易逆差为122亿欧元。

pinyin: wai4 shang1 zhi2 jie1 tou2 zi1

definition: difference in exchange rates in different regions
local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
